example.name: Flask Web App

components.name: Core Web Framework
components.purpose: Lightweight WSGI web application framework with flexible routing and templating

example.architecture_md:
# Flask Framework Architecture

Flask is a lightweight WSGI web application framework. It is designed to make getting started quick and easy, with the ability to scale up to complex applications.

## Core Components

- **Application Context**: Central Flask application object
- **Blueprint System**: Modular application structure
- **Request Handling**: WSGI-based request/response cycle
- **Template Engine**: Jinja2 integration for dynamic content

## Design Philosophy

- Minimalist core with extensions
- Explicit is better than implicit
- Simple tasks should be simple
example.mermaid_modules:
graph TD
    A[src/flask/app.py] --> B[src/flask/blueprints.py]
    A --> C[src/flask/templating.py]
    A --> D[werkzeug]
example.mermaid_folders:
graph TD
    ROOT[flask]
    ROOT --> SRC[src/flask/]
    ROOT --> TESTS[tests/]
    ROOT --> EXAMPLES[examples/]
example.mermaid_modules_simple:
graph TD
    A["🌶️ Flask App"] --> B["📋 Blueprints"]
    A --> C["🎨 Templates"]
    B --> D["🔧 Werkzeug"]
example.mermaid_modules_balanced:
graph TD
    subgraph "Flask Framework"
        A[Application] --> B[Blueprint System]
        A --> C[Request Context]
    end
    
    subgraph "External Libraries"
        D[Werkzeug]
        E[Jinja2]
    end
    
    A --> D
    C --> E
example.mermaid_modules_detailed:
graph TD
    A[src/flask/app.py] -->|"registers"| B[src/flask/blueprints.py]
    A -->|"manages"| C[src/flask/ctx.py]
    A -->|"renders"| D[src/flask/templating.py]
    C -->|"built on"| E[werkzeug/local.py]
    D -->|"uses"| F[jinja2/environment.py]
    A -->|"handles"| G[src/flask/wrappers.py]
example.description: Lightweight WSGI web application framework - simple, flexible, and scalable
